name: Analysis Agent Evaluation Set
description: Test cases for the Analysis Agent, covering descriptive statistics, frequency analysis, segmentation, and suggestions.

parts.text: {"results": [{"analysis_type": "descriptive_statistics", "column": "score", "metrics": {"mean": 600.0, "median": 600.0, "mode": null, "standard_deviation": 81.65, "variance": 6666.67, "minimum": 500, "maximum": 700, "q1": 550.0, "q3": 650.0, "iqr": 100.0}}], "suggestions": ["The scores show a moderate spread. Consider visualizing the distribution with a histogram or box plot."]}

{"results": [{"analysis_type": "frequency_analysis", "column": "city", "frequencies": {"A": {"count": 2, "percentage": 50.0}, "B": {"count": 1, "percentage": 25.0}, "C": {"count": 1, "percentage": 25.0}}}], "suggestions": ["City A is the most frequent. You might want to investigate if this pattern holds in larger datasets or across different segments."]}

{"results": [{"analysis_type": "aggregation", "group_by_columns": ["type"], "metric_column": "value", "groups": [{"type": "X", "mean_value": 12.5}, {"type": "Y", "mean_value": 20.0}]}], "suggestions": ["The average value for type Y is higher than for type X. Consider exploring other metrics like median or standard deviation for these groups."]}

{"dataset": "[{\"math_score\": 600, \"hours_study\": 4}, {\"math_score\": 700, \"hours_study\": 6}, {\"math_score\": 500, \"hours_study\": 3}]", "analysis_instructions": "Compute the correlation matrix for numerical variables."}

{"results": [{"analysis_type": "correlation_analysis", "correlation_matrix": {"math_score": {"math_score": 1.0, "hours_study": 0.9819805060619658}, "hours_study": {"math_score": 0.9819805060619658, "hours_study": 1.0}}}], "suggestions": ["There is a strong positive correlation between 'math_score' and 'hours_study'. Consider a scatter plot to visualize this relationship."]}

{"results": [{"analysis_type": "error", "error_message": "Descriptive statistics can only be calculated for numerical data. {"dataset": "[{\"region\": \"North\", \"score_math\": 550, \"score_lang\": 600}, {\"region\": \"South\", \"score_math\": 650, \"score_lang\": 620}, {\"region\": \"North\", \"score_math\": 580, \"score_lang\": 610}]", "analysis_instructions": "Provide descriptive statistics for 'score_math' and 'score_lang', and also group by 'region' to find average math scores."}

{"results": [{"analysis_type": "descriptive_statistics", "column": "score_math", "metrics": {"mean": 593.33, "median": 580.0, "mode": null, "standard_deviation": 41.99, "variance": 1763.33, "minimum": 550, "maximum": 650, "q1": 565.0, "q3": 615.0, "iqr": 50.0}}, {"analysis_type": "descriptive_statistics", "column": "score_lang", "metrics": {"mean": 610.0, "median": 610.0, "mode": null, "standard_deviation": 8.16, "variance": 66.67, "minimum": 600, "maximum": 620, "q1": 605.0, "q3": 615.0, "iqr": 10.0}}, {"analysis_type": "aggregation", "group_by_columns": ["region"], "metric_column": "score_math", "groups": [{"region": "North", "mean_score_math": 565.0}, {"region": "South", "mean_score_math": 650.0}]}], "suggestions": ["Average math score in the South region is notably higher.
